entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:02 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 03:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -16.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h then light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
